majna-answer: Majna Store is a multi-user e-commerce website for customers, distributors and visitors to facilitate the buying and selling of products
who-use-answer: You can be Authorized or not, authorization has many merits
authentication-process-answer: You Fitst Write Your Email, Password and role (Customer, Distributor, Reviewer) then Wait for activation Link sent in Your Inbox finally you login with your Email and Password
customer-do-answer: Being a Customer gives you the right to view products, filter them based on specific criteria, add them to your cart and purchase them.
distributor-do-answer: Being a distributor gives you the right to add brands by adding the type of brand, defining the identity, and authorizing the brand, and waiting until it is reviewed and approved by the reviewer, add your stores from the city, store name, and full store address, finally adding products so that they appear to everyone and can be purchased later.
important-questions: Some Important Questions You may Ask About Our Majna-Store
filter-type: What are the types of filtering products ?
filter-type-answer: The user can filter products based on several factors (Category, SubCategory, Price),You can also search for a specific product and the ordering of products can be simplified and arranged in ascending and descending order.
both-langs-answer: Of course Majna-Store is a multilingual Website that Supports both languages (Arabic, English)
both-modes: Does Majn-Store support dark and light modes?
both-modes-answer: Of course Majna-Store supports both modes (dark, light)
